turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to place a pickup order for Peets Coffee on 1154 Westwood Boulevard Los Angeles, CA.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, no problem! What were you looking to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size Mocha Javiva would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, and what type of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Non fat, 2%, whole milk, almond milk, and soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you want a large Mocha Javiva with almond milk and whipped cream correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, and did you want me to charge it to your Peet's Coffee account?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, just to confirm you are picking up a large Mocha Javiva at the Peets Coffee at 1154 Westwood Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90024 correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great! I've confirmed your order and it is being crafted and will be ready for pickup shortly (probably 5-10 minutes). A receipt will be sent via text message to your mobile phone.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! Was there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Have a good day and enjoy your coffee! Goodbye!
